thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Philip

author: Philip
title: Philip
text: Superb price and top quality car delivered. Small 'but' though; car arrived 20 minutes late by rental company (Global Rent A Car) and were late picking the car up, even though I had called them 24 hours previous to amend booking pick-up time. Apart from that no one else came close to their price for the SUV I hired or the Full Protection insurance purchased. Would use again.
